<!-- Bill Splitter Project Instructions -->

## Project: Bill Splitter for Vietnamese E-commerce Invoices

### Tech Stack
- Frontend: React + TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js + Express
- Storage: localStorage (Phase 1), PostgreSQL (Phase 2+)
- Parser: Cheerio for HTML parsing

### Project Structure
```
bill-splitter/
├── frontend/          # React application
├── backend/           # Node.js API server
└── shared/            # Shared types and utilities
```

### Development Progress
- [x] Create project structure
- [ ] Setup frontend with React + TailwindCSS
- [ ] Create HTML parser for invoices
- [ ] Implement bill splitting logic
- [ ] Add localStorage persistence
- [ ] Setup backend API (future)
- [ ] Add PostgreSQL database (future)
